name: 2D Platformer game (jnorbi99)
description:
This is my 2D platformer Project!

My modifications are the following:

  • I Replaced the sound effects in the game to update the sound design of the game.
  • I Added custom music to my game, what I created in the garage band application.
  • I modified the main menu designe.
  • I created the level 3 with and powerful enemies (you can try it, it's a bit hard to complete).

Credits
